org.jay3d.engine.core.components

Class FreeLook

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jay3d.engine.core.components.GameComponent
      • org.jay3d.engine.core.components.FreeLook

  • public class FreeLook
extends GameComponent
    'Temporary' class that handles the object's mouse movement that is controlled by the user.

    The default key to unlock mouse from screen(after already clicking on screen) is the KEY_ESCAPE(0x01) under Input class.

    Author:
    Juxhin Dyrmishi Brigjaj

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Input method that calculates and translates the mouse movement directly on screen.

      • Y_AXIS

        public static final Vector3f Y_AXIS

    • Constructor Detail

      • FreeLook

        public FreeLook(float sensitivity)
        Constructs and initialises the mouse movement with custom sensitivity.

        The default key to unlock mouse from screen(after already clicking on screen) is the KEY_ESCAPE(0x01) under Input class.

        Parameters:
        sensitivity - The mouse sensitivity

      • FreeLook

        public FreeLook(float sensitivity,
                int unlockMouseKey)
        Constructs and initialises the mouse movement with custom sensitivity and custom escape key.

        The default key to unlock mouse from screen(after already clicking on screen) is the KEY_ESCAPE(0x01) under Input class. Therefore it is recommended you use any int value other than 0x01.

        Parameters:
        sensitivity - The mouse sensitivity
        unlockMouseKey - Custom Input key in order to unlock mouse from the screen

    • Method Detail

      • input

        public void input(float delta)
        Input method that calculates and translates the mouse movement directly on screen. This method is overriding it's parent's public void input method.
        Overrides:
        input in class GameComponent
